name: mongo-driver-benchmarks
description: benchmarks comparison for mongodb native driver 1.X and 2.X
author: bubenshchykov

scripts.postinstall:
echo '
Installing mongodb driver v1.X ...
' && npm install --prefix ./node_modules/_mongodb/v1 git+ssh://git@github.com:mongodb/node-mongodb-native.git#V1.4.28 && echo '
Installing mongodb driver v1.X ...
' && npm install --prefix ./node_modules/_mongodb/v2 git+ssh://git@github.com:mongodb/node-mongodb-native.git#V2.0.13
